title: Cuffed

description.plain:
On “Cuffed,“ Juice WRLD celebrates his accomplishments as result of his position as an artist, alongside his usual references to his women, money and drugs.

The track was first previewed within the late months of 2018 via DY Krazy’s Instagram. The track was later previewed in September of 2021 by label executive, Lil Bibby—hinting at a possible official release. The track later leaked in its entirety on October 10, 2021, and found its official release as the fifth track on Juice’s final posthumous album The Party Never Ends in November 2024.

embed_content: Read “Cuffed” by Juice WRLD on Genius
recording_location: Rented Home Recording Studio, Sandy Springs, Atlanta, GA

album.full_title: The Party Never Ends (Deluxe) by Juice WRLD
album.name: The Party Never Ends (Deluxe)
